products.name: Oeufs Plein Air
products.labels: Oeufs de France, PME Plus, Céréales locales, Emploi local, Exploitations familiales, Fondation APHP
products.facts: ["Oeufs Plein Air - 20 oeufs are produced from free-range hens that have access to outdoor spaces, promoting animal welfare.","The eggs are packaged in environmentally friendly materials, reducing plastic waste.","These eggs are certified organic, ensuring that the hens are fed organic feed without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.","Oeufs Plein Air emphasizes high quality by adhering to strict standards for freshness and taste, ensuring superior flavor."]

products.name: Quaker rice cakes apple cinnamon
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Puffed cereal cakes, Puffed rice cakes
products.facts: ["Made from whole grain brown rice, providing a gluten-free snack option.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a more natural product.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Low in calories, making it a popular choice for those seeking healthier snack alternatives."]

products.name: Cake aux Fruits
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Sliced breads, Fruit loaf, en:cakes
products.facts: ["Cake aux Fruits is typically made with a mix of dried fruits, nuts, and a rich batter that may include butter, sugar, and eggs.","Many recipes for Cake aux Fruits can be adapted to use organic ingredients, promoting sustainable agriculture.","The use of seasonal and local fruits can enhance the ecological footprint of Cake aux Fruits by reducing transportation emissions.","Quality Cake aux Fruits is often aged for several weeks, allowing the flavors to meld and develop, which is a hallmark of traditional baking methods."]

products.name: Authentic Granary
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Sliced breads
products.facts: ["Made from 100% whole grains for maximum nutrition.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives for pure quality.","Sourced from sustainable farms to promote ecological balance."]

products.name: Tomato ketchup, tomato
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Groceries
products.facts: ["Tomato ketchup is primarily made from tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and various spices.","Tomatoes used in ketchup are often grown in monoculture farms, which can lead to reduced biodiversity and soil health.","High-quality ketchup is made from ripe, fresh tomatoes, which contain more natural sugars and flavor compared to overripe or lower-quality tomatoes.","Organic ketchup options are available, which use tomatoes grown without synthetic pesticides and fertilizers, promoting better ecological practices."]

products.name: Extra dark chocolate 80%
products.facts: ["Contains 80% cocoa solids, providing a rich and intense chocolate flavor.","Made from sustainably sourced cocoa beans, supporting fair trade practices.","High in antioxidants, contributing to potential health benefits such as improved heart health.","Typically has a lower sugar content compared to milk chocolate, making it a healthier option."]

products.name: Organic Unsweetened Ketchup
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Tomato sauces, Ketchup, Tomato Ketchup
products.labels: Organic, Vegetarian, No GMOs, USDA Organic, Vegan, No added sugar, No milk, No palm oil, Non GMO project, Keto-certified, No fish, Paleo, Whole-30
products.facts: ["Made from organic tomatoes, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used in cultivation.","Contains no added sugars, making it a healthier alternative to conventional ketchup.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Non-GMO verified, ensuring that the ingredients are not genetically modified."]

products.name: Baked Snack Crackers extra toasty
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality ingredients for great taste.","Baked, not fried, reducing unhealthy fats.","Packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting sustainability.","Extra toasty flavor achieved through a unique baking process."]

products.name: Knoor chicken flavor bouillon
products.facts: ["Knoor chicken flavor bouillon is made with real chicken broth for authentic taste.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","It contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring quality ingredients.","Knoor products are gluten-free, catering to a wider range of dietary needs."]

products.name: Organic White Bread Done Right Thin-Sliced
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Sliced breads
products.labels: Organic, No GMOs, USDA Organic, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with organic whole wheat flour for better nutrition.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives.","Sourced from sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance.","Thin-sliced for convenience while maintaining high quality and taste."]
